summary:
ONEX - Founded by key industry experts in 2018 and based in Singapore, ONEX. is a leading provider of secure and user-friendly DeFi and cryptocurrency eWallet solutions.

 Team - The ONEX team combines deep technical expertise in DeFi and cryptocurrency markets with years of experience in the traditional banking, finance and trading industry.

 App Features - Store Funds, Make Transactions and Track Payments - secure your activities with the essential features of the ONEX Wallet.
